attributes.action: Increase support for Epilepsy & Mental Health Illnesses in Leeds
attributes.additional_details:
Doctors in Leeds are reporting an increase in new cases of Epilepsy and some sufferers also have other mental health issues. Many epileptic seizures are triggered by mental health issues and more funding for research needs to available to monitor this.

PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION TO HELP PERSUADE THE GOVERNMENT TO ACT NOW
